thread.title: Mizzou loses ugly game to Georgia on the road
thread.title_full: Mizzou loses ugly game to Georgia on the road

title: Mizzou loses ugly game to Georgia on the road
text:
KMIZ ATHENS, Ga - 
Ugly is the only way to describe Mizzou's 9-6 loss on the road against Georgia. Mizzou falls to 4-3 on the season. The Tigers are 1-3 in SEC play. 
Drew Lock finished 11-26 for 143 yards. Missouri finished with just 164 yards of offense. The Tigers had 21 yards rushing. 
On the flipside, linebacker Kentrell Brothers finished with 17 total tackles. He now has 91 total tackles on the season, which leads the NCAA. 
Mizzou is back on the road next week against Vanderbilt. Kickoff is scheduled for 3 p.m. CT.
